newsitem.title: USA: U of Michigan consumer sentiment Sept prelim 95.0.
newsitem.headline: U of Michigan consumer sentiment Sept prelim 95.0.

text.p: The University of Michigan's preliminary index of consumer sentiment for September fell to 95.0 from 95.3 in the final August index, financial market sources said on Friday.
The current conditions component fell to 102.4 in the September preliminary report from 107.8 in the final August.
The expectations index rose to 90.2 in the preliminary September data from 87.3 in the final August, the sources added.
The data are released only to paying subscribers.
